input_text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to choose good clothes?
input_text.Response A:
Decide which features you would like to emphasize.
Know your measurements.
Make sure your clothing fits.
Buy clothing that looks great on you now.
Check how clothing looks from behind.
Don't always follow fashion trends.
Find colors that work for you.
Stick with a brand that you like.
Buy multiple versions of clothing that you like.
Pay attention to each item's value.
Cover the basics.
Pick one or two neutral colors for your workhorse pieces.
Shop with your current wardrobe in mind.
Get rid of anything you don't wear.
input_text.Response B: Sure, I can help you choose good clothes.  First of all, you want to buy clothes that fit you well.  Then, you want to buy clothes that are comfortable, and also look good on you.  You also want to buy clothes that are high quality, so they last a long time.  Finally, you want to buy clothes that are reasonably priced, so you don’t spend too much money.  Does that make sense?  Let me know if you have any questions.

label_annotations.feedback: Very easy to understand instructions. Simple task!
